net.openhft.chronicle.core

Enum Jvm

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<Jvm>
      • net.openhft.chronicle.core.Jvm
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Comparable<Jvm>

    public enum Jvm
extends Enum<Jvm>
    Utility class to access information in the JVM.

      • values

        public static Jvm[] values()
        Returns an array containing the constants of this enum type, in the order they are declared. This method may be used to iterate over the constants as follows: 
        for (Jvm c : Jvm.values())
    System.out.println(c);
        Returns:
        an array containing the constants of this enum type, in the order they are declared

      • busyWaitUntil

        public static void busyWaitUntil(long waitUntil)

        Parameters:
        waitUntil - nanosecond precision counter value to await.

      • parseSize

        public static long parseSize(String value)
                      throws IllegalArgumentException
        Parse a string as a decimal memory size with an optional scale. K/k = * 210, M/m = 220, G/g = 210, T/t = 240

        trailing B/b/iB/ib are ignored.

        100100 bytes
        100b100 bytes
        0.5kb512 bytes
        0.125MB128 KiB
        2M2 MiB
        0.75GiB768 MiB
        0.001TiB1.024 GiB

        Parameters:
        value - size to parse
        Returns:
        the size
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the string could be parsed

      • getSize

        public static long getSize(String property,
                           long defaultValue)
        Uses Jvm.parseSize to parse a system property or returns defaultValue if not present, empty or unparseable.
        Parameters:
        property - to look up
        defaultValue - to use otherwise
        Returns:
        the size in bytes as a long
